DOC.brief_title: A Study Assess Bioequivalence Darunavir When Co-Administrated With Cobicistat Under Fed Fasted Conditions
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize ( study drug assign chance ) , open-label ( people know identity intervention ) , 3-panel , single-center , single-dose , crossover ( method use switch patient one treatment arm another clinical trial ) study 134 healthy adult participant . The study consist 3 phase include screen phase approximately 3 week ( Days -21 -1 ) follow open-label treatment phase consist 3 panel 2 single-dose treatment session 5 day ( Days -1 4 ) separate washout period least 7 day , follow-up period occur 7 10 day last intake study drug . The study consist 3 panel . In panel participant randomly assign 1 2 treatment sequence ( AB BA Panel 1 ; CD DC Panel 2 ; EF FE Panel 3 ) . Participants receive either single-dose darunavir 800 mg 2 x 400 mg tablet cobicistat 150 mg tablet single-dose darunavir/cobicistat 800/150 mg tablet panel ( feed fast condition ) .
